tags.name: for-instance
tags.description: Test instances of custom element for custom event signature contracts.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: Name of tag to test / showcase.

attributes.name: contract-prop
attributes.description: Name of property that specifies contract.

attributes.name: skip-imports
attributes.description: If test page contains needed imports, skip any imports contained in test script.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: Name of tag to test / showcase.

properties.name: contractProp
properties.description: Name of property that specifies contract.

properties.name: skipImports
properties.description: If test page contains needed imports, skip any imports contained in test script.

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
